casebody.data:
BNSF RAILWAY CO., petitioner,
v.
Kelli TYRRELL, Special Administrator for the Estate of Brent T. TYRRELL, Deceased, et al. No. 16-405. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2017. Motion of National Association of Manufacturers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The Association of American Railroads for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Montana granted.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
